column2: the room looked so funny. The sun was shining into part of it
column3: and yet all the rest was quite dark and shady. So Jack jumped up and dressed himself and went to the window. And what do you think he saw? Why
column4: the beans his mother had thrown out of the window into the garden had sprung up into a big beanstalk which went up and up and up till it reached the sky. So the man spoke truth after all.The beanstalk grew up quite close past Jack's window
column5: so all he had to do was to open it and give a jump onto the beanstalk which ran up just like a big ladder. So Jack climbed
column11: and he climbed till at last he reached the sky. And when he got there he found a long broad road going as straight as a dart. So he walked along
column13: and he walked along till he came to a great big tall house
column14: and on the doorstep there was a great big tall woman.
